name: Spring Flowers (Frances)
description:
It's finally spring! What a wonderful season!

You've just moved into this new town, and it's your first ever spring. You've always wanted to plant those rapidly growing flowers, so you decide to give it a try.

How to play:
  1. Click on a seed to select it.
  2. Click on a plot to plant the seed.
  3. If you want to remove a plant, click on it.
  4. Try to get the right-colored plants in the right-colored plots!

This game was made for Great Spring Jam 2021 by Frances Calceta.

(By the way... If you download it, there's significantly less lag than when you play it in the browser.)
